Hydras Puppet::

"Yes... I heard a lot things a lot about you Vykos... A lot things 
that could do a predacon proud... And at this time, I should guess 
that I'm Megatron and Galvatron fused in Hydras..." "hissed Puppet 
Hydras while he narrowed his eyes who added"If my guard annoyed you, 
they can remain outside, in order to chat more... confortable... "

Puppet Hydras eyes' didn't expressed anyway.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> After a moment, after hearing this New Megatron's announcement, 
Lord 
> Vykos decided to act.
> 
> Vykos: Warghoul, find out what you can on this Megatron Revived. I 
> will meet this "Hydras".
> 
> Warghoul left clumsily for a computer room while his Lord opened a 
> door and greeted his guests.
> 
> Vykos: Welcome to my ship, Hydras. I am Lord Vykos, but surely, a 
> part of you remembers me, doesn't it? I am afraid that your guards 
> aren't allowed to hear what I have to say. They will have to stay 
> here for now.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras Puppet:
> > 
> > "Nope... they are preds as us but, we must be awared "replied
